attributes.action: consider including the option of "None of the above" on all ballot papers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
POSITIVE ABSTENTION
We, the undersigned, being privileged to vote in the United Kingdom, petition the Government to amend the current rules of Voting in both local and national elections to include on all ballot sheets a provision for a “none of these” option and, in addition, for Returning Officers to record and announce the count of these votes at the same time as the counts are announced for standing candidates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
